crown.name: CSK_Module_MultiImageEdgeMatcher
crown.desc: This is an automatically generated CROWN (description not necessary).

crown.name: CSK_MultiImageEdgeMatcher
crown.desc: Module to provide EdgeMatcher functionality. Multiple instances can be created and will run in multiple threads on the device. + This module provides a UI for all relevant features. + {empty} + Typically to configure this module to work with other modules you should do this: + {empty} + 1) If multiple instances are needed, these can be added via 'addInstance' (not needed if you only use 1 single instance). + 2) Select the instance you want to configur via setInstance(). + 3) Set the event providing the images to be processed e.g. via setRegisterEvent('CSK_ImagePlayer.OnNewImage'). + 4) Optionally edit EdgeMatcher parameters via 'setEdgeThreshold', 'setMaximumMatches', 'setDownsampleFactor', ... (check other 'set....' function as well..). + INFO: Regarding further details of the EdgeMatcher parameters please read the AppSpace API documentation. + 5) Press the "Teach Mode" button within the UI. It will provide a ROI (Region of interest) editor to select an object and show its tought edges. Press the button again to confirm the tought structure. + 6) Define the minimum valid score via 'setMinScore'. + 7) The module will align the image in relation to the first found object. Other modules can register on the 'CSK_MultiImageEdgeMatcher.OnNewAlignedImage[NUM]' event to receive the aligned image for further processing, on the 'CSK_MultiImageEdgeMatcher.OnNewTransformation[NUM]' event to receive the transformation itself or on 'CSK_MultiImageEdgeMatcher.OnNewStatusFoundMatchesNUM' / 'CSK_MultiImageEdgeMatcher.OnNewStatusMatchScoreResultNUM' to receive the processing result values. + {empty} +

item.desc: Set if image contains a lot of other edges, structures, noise, clutter in areas not belonging to the object of interest (like barcodes and text which generate a lot of edge responses).
item.name: HIGH

item.desc: Set for clean scenes to gain speed.
item.name: MEDIUM

item.desc: Set for clean scenes to gain speed.
item.name: LOW

event.name: OnNewStatusLoadParameterOnReboot
event.desc: Notify status if parameters should be loaded on app/device boot up.

event.name: OnPersistentDataModuleAvailable
event.desc: Notify status if features of CSK_PersistentData module are available.

event.name: OnNewInstanceList
event.desc: Event to provide list of created instances.

event.name: OnNewProcessingParameter
event.desc: Event to share processing parameters to the instances.

param.desc: Numeric identifier of the instance to receive the parameter.
param.name: objectNo

param.desc: Numeric identifier, if parameter is for specific internal used object.
param.name: internalObjectNo

event.name: OnNewSelectedInstance
event.desc: Notify if new instance is selected.

event.name: OnDataLoadedOnReboot
event.desc: Event to call after module loaded parameters and is ready.

event.name: OnNewParameterName
event.desc: Notify name of persistent data parameter.

event.name: OnUserLevelOperatorActive
event.desc: Status of Operator userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelMaintenanceActive
event.desc: Status of Maintenance userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelServiceActive
event.desc: Status of Service userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnUserLevelAdminActive
event.desc: Status of Admin userlevel. Used internally in combination with the CSK_UserManagement module if available.

event.name: OnNewValueUpdateNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to sync paramters between instance threads and Controller part of module. + NUM will be replaced by the numeric identifier of instance (e.g. "OnNewValueUpdate1"). +

param.desc: Instance the new value is coming from.
param.name: instance

param.desc: Name of the paramter to update/sync.
param.name: parameter

param.desc: Optional: If internal parameter should be used for internal objects.
param.name: selectedObject

event.name: OnNewValueToForwardNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to forward data from instance thread to Controller part of module, e.g. to forward values to UI. + NUM will be replaced by the numeric identifier of instance (e.g. "OnNewValueToForward1"). +

param.desc: Eventname to use to forward value.
param.name: eventname

event.name: OnNewViewerID
event.desc: Notify viewerID for viewer in UI for currently selected instance.

event.name: OnNewStatusRegisteredEvent
event.desc: Notify event instance is registered to receive new image to process.

event.name: OnROIEditorActive
event.desc: Notify if ROI editor is currently active in UI.

event.name: OnNewStatusShowImage
event.desc: Notify if image should be showed in UI.

event.name: OnNewStatusEdgeThreshold
event.desc: Notify currently used edge threshold.

event.name: OnNewStatusMinimalScore
event.desc: Notify currently minimal valid match score.

event.name: OnNewStatusDownsampleFactor
event.desc: Notify currently used downsample factor of edge matcher.

event.name: OnNewStatusMaxMatches
event.desc: Notify maximum amount of matches to find.

event.name: OnNewAlignedImageNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to provide aligned image to be used for post processing. + NUM will be replaced by the numeric identifier of instance (e.g. "OnNewAlignedImage1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewStatusMatchScoreResultNUM
event.desc: Notify score of match. Example of dynamically created event to provide score of match. + NUM will be replaced by the numeric identifier of instance (e.g. "OnNewStatusMatchScoreResult1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewStatusMatchScoreResult
event.desc: Notify score of found match of currently selected EdgeMatcher instance.

event.name: OnNewStatusFoundMatches
event.desc: Notify amount of found matches of currently selected EdgeMatcher instance.

event.name: OnNewStatusFoundMatchesNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to provide result of found matches. + NUM will be replaced by the numeric identifier of instance (e.g. "OnNewStatusFoundMatches1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewTransformationNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to provide transformation data to be used for post processing. + NUM will be replaced by the numeric identifier of instance (e.g. "OnNewTransformation1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

event.name: OnNewStatusResultTranslateX
event.desc: Notify pixel to transform result in x direction.

event.name: OnNewStatusResultTranslateY
event.desc: Notify pixel to transform result in y direction.

event.name: OnNewStatusFoundValidMatches
event.desc: Notify amount of found matches with valid score of currently selected EdgeMatcher instance.

event.name: OnNewStatusFoundValidMatchesNUM
event.desc: Example of dynamically created event to provide result of found matches with valid score. + NUM will be replaced by the number of instance (e.g. "OnNewStatusFoundValidMatches1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsEvent" if event of sepecific instance exists.

param.desc: Amount of found matches with valid score.
param.name: amount

event.name: OnNewStatusTought
event.desc: Notify if matcher was teached already.

event.name: OnNewStatusBackgroundClutter
event.desc: Notify background clutter level.

event.name: OnNewStatusMinimumSeparation
event.desc: Notify minimum separation between the center of object matches.

param.desc: The minimum separation between the centers of two objects in image world units.
param.name: minSeparation

event.name: OnNewStatusPerformFineSearch
event.desc: Notify if the fine search should be perfromed.

event.name: OnNewStatusRotationRange
event.desc: Notify angle in degree, the maximum deviation from the original object orientation to search for.

event.name: OnNewStatusPriorRotation
event.desc: Notify prior orientation for rotation range.

event.name: OnNewStatusMinScale
event.desc: Notify smallest scale factor to search for.

param.desc: Lower limit is 0.8. Default value is 1.0
param.name: minScale

event.name: OnNewStatusMaxScale
event.desc: Notify largest scale factor to search for.

param.desc: Upper limit is 1.2. Default value is 1.0.
param.name: maxScale

event.name: OnNewStatusPriorScale
event.desc: Notfiy prior scale factor for scale ranger.

event.name: OnNewStatusTileCount
event.desc: Notify how many tile images the match image should be splitted into.

param.desc: Number of tile images to split into.
param.name: tileCount

event.name: OnNewStatusTimeout
event.desc: Notify time in seconds after which the match algorithm should abort.

param.desc: Time in seconds after which the algorithm should abort.
param.name: timeoutSeconds

function.name: setParameterName
function.desc: Function to set the name of the parameters if saved/loaded via the CSK_PersistentData module.

function.name: sendParameters
function.desc: Send parameters to CSK_PersistentData module if possible to save them.

function.name: loadParameters
function.desc: Load parameters for this module from the CSK_PersistentData module if possible and use them.

function.name: setLoadOnReboot
function.desc: Configure if this module should load its saved parameters at app/ device boot up.

function.name: pageCalled
function.desc: Function to register "OnResume" of the module UI (only as helper function).

return.desc: Empty string (only needed to simplify binding).
return.name: empty

function.name: setSelectedInstance
function.desc: Select one of the multiple instances.

function.name: getInstancesAmount
function.desc: Get the amount of created instances of this module.

function.name: setRegisterEvent
function.desc: Configure event that this module should listen to. If this event is notified, it will be linked to the internal processing function. + (Will be set to currently active instance, see 'setSelectedObject')

function.name: processInstanceNUM
function.desc: Example of dynamically served function to process internally coded function. + NUM will be replaced by the numeric identifier of instance (e.g. "processInstance1"). + INFO: Other modules can check via "Script.isServedAsFunction" if function of sepecific instance exists. + Needs then to be called via "Script.callFunction".

function.name: addInstance
function.desc: Function to add an additional instance.

function.name: resetInstances
function.desc: Function to reset instances to one single instance. + IMPORTANT: As instances start their own threads, the module needs to be restarted if new instances are needed... (see AppEngine docu for "Script.startScript").

function.name: setTeachMode
function.desc: Set status of teach mode for edge matcher. + If TRUE, the viewer in the UI will install an editor for the ROI. + If FALSE it will update the masks accordingly.

function.name: setEdgeThreshold
function.desc: Function to set edge threshold.

function.name: setMinimumValidScore
function.desc: Function to set minimal valid match score.

function.name: setDownsampleFactor
function.desc: Function to set downsample factor of edge matcher. + Setting this parameter will invalidate any previous teach call!

function.name: setMaximumMatches
function.desc: Function to set maximum amount of matches to find.

function.name: setShowImage
function.desc: Function to select if image should be shown on UI.

function.name: setResultTransX
function.desc: Function to set image translation in x direction added to found object position.

function.name: setResultTransY
function.desc: Function to set image translation in y direction added to found object position.

function.name: unteach
function.desc: Function to unteach matcher.

function.name: setBackgroundClutter
function.desc: Function to set background clutter level.

function.name: setMinSeparation
function.desc: Function to set the minimum separation between the centers of object matches.

param.desc: The minimum separation between the centers of two objects in image world units. The default value is 50.
param.name: minSeparation

function.name: setFineSearch
function.desc: Function to set status if fine search should be performed.

function.name: setRotationRange
function.desc: Function to set rotation interval to search in relative to the teach orientation.

param.desc: Angle in degree unit, the maximum deviation from the original object orientation to search for. The default value is 180 degrees, i.e., full rotation.
param.name: range

function.name: setPriorRotation
function.desc: Function to set prior orientation for rotation interval (see TODO).

param.desc: Prior orientation in degrees. The orientation search range is centered around this orientation. Default is zero (i.e. same orientation as teach object).
param.name: orientation

function.name: setMinScale
function.desc: Function to set minimum of scale interval to search relative to the teach size.

param.desc: The smallest scale factor to search for. Lower limit is 0.8. Default value is 1.0.
param.name: value

function.name: setMaxScale
function.desc: Function to set maximum of scale interval to search relative to the teach size.

param.desc: The largest scale factor to search for. Upper limit is 1.2. Default value is 1.0.
param.name: value

function.name: setPriorScale
function.desc: Function to set prior scale factor of scale interval to search relative to the teach size.

param.desc: Set to the expected scale of the object to find, relative to the size of the teach object. E.g. 1.25 if the object to find is 25% larger than the teach object. Min: 0.1. Max: 10
param.name: value

function.name: setTileCount
function.desc: Function to set into how many tile images the match image should be splitted into.

param.desc: Number of tile images to split into. 0 gives automatic selection. 1 disables tiling. Default: 0.
param.name: value

function.name: setTimeout
function.desc: Function to set the time the match call should abort if time exceeds.

param.desc: Time in seconds after which the algorithm should abort. The default value is 5 seconds.
param.name: value
